oai_dc:dc.dc:title: STABILITY AND OPTIMAL-CONTROL OF STOCHASTIC FUNCTIONAL-DIFFERENTIAL EQUATIONS WITH MEMORY
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GOVINDAN, TE
JOSHI, MC
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: existence
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The concept of a bounded stochastic integral contractor is utilized to obtain the existence of an optimal stochastic control for a large class of stochastic functional-differential equations with memory. Employing Ito's formula, stochastic global stability in mean [11] is obtained as a by-product. Further, sufficient conditions are given in terms of the Liapunov function for the solution of such nonlinear systems to decay exponentially in mean-square.
